import "/home/marv/the-odin-project/react-projects/anime-search/src/GameLinks/Game1/game1.css"; import g1 from "/home/marv/the-odin-project/react-projects/anime-search/src/HomePage/Images/g1.jpg"; import { useState,useEffect } from "react"; export default function Game1() { const [seconds, setSeconds] = useState(0); const [zoom, setZoom] = useState(false); const handleClick = (event) => { setZoom((current) => !current); }; /* timer */ useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setSeconds(seconds => seconds + 1); }, 1000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); /* timer formatter */ function formatter (t){ const d = Number(t); /* const h = Math.floor(d / 3600); */ const m = Math.floor((d % 3600) / 60); const s = Math.floor((d % 3600) % 60); /* const hDisplay = h > 0 ? `${h.toString().length > 1 ? `${h}` : `${0}${h}`}` : '00'; */ const mDisplay = m > 0 ? `${m.toString().length > 1 ? `${m}` : `${m}`}` : '0'; const sDisplay = s > 0 ? `${s.toString().length > 1 ? `${s}` : `${0}${s}`}` : '00'; return `${mDisplay}:${sDisplay}`; }; return (
{/* nav bar */}
{formatter(seconds)}
{/* cells to make area clickable */}
{/* search area */}
{/* footer */}
); }
